job_description:
Customer Relationship Executive

KENLAND IT SOLUTIONS (P) Ltd 3rd & 5th FLOORS, M SQUARED BUILDING, ANNEX 2, TECHNOPARK CAMPUS, KARIYAVATTOM, TRIVANDRUM, KERALA , 695581

https://www.kenland.in

Closing Date: 16, Sept 2025 Job Published: 16, Aug 2025 Contact Email: recruiter@kenland.in

We're seeking an experienced Customer Relationship Executive with a minimum of 1 year of expertise to join our team. As a Customer Relationship Executive, you'll be instrumental in ensuring customer satisfaction and handling inquiries with finesse.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Respond promptly and professionally to customer queries via phone, email, and live chat.
  • Provide accurate information about our products or services, guiding customers through our platforms.
  • Resolve customer issues efficiently, ensuring a positive resolution.
  • Collaborate with internal teams to escalate and address complex problems, prioritizing customer satisfaction.
  • Stay updated on product knowledge to effectively assist customers.

Requirements:

  • Minimum of 1 year of experience in customer support roles.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Strong problem-solving skills with a customer-centric approach.
  • Ability to collaborate within a team and coordinate with other departments.
  • Familiarity with Google Business tools.
  • Proficiency in English and Malayalam; Tamil language skills are a plus.
  • Proactive attitude and adaptability in a fast-paced environment.

If you possess these qualifications and are passionate about delivering outstanding customer service, we invite you to apply for this position.

Preferred Skills Communication skills

Languages: English, Malayalam, Tamil
summary: Kenland IT Solutions is hiring a Customer Relationship Executive. The role involves ensuring customer satisfaction through effective communication and problem-solving.

job_description:
Senior Dot Net Developer

KENLAND IT SOLUTIONS (P) Ltd 3rd & 5th FLOORS, M SQUARED BUILDING, ANNEX 2, TECHNOPARK CAMPUS, KARIYAVATTOM, TRIVANDRUM, KERALA, 695581 https://www.kenland.in

Closing Date: 16, Sept 2025 Job Published: 16, Aug 2025 Contact Email: recruiter@kenland.in

Brief Description

We are seeking a skilled and experienced Project Lead with expertise in .NET Core to lead and manage the development of complex software projects. The ideal candidate will have strong technical knowledge, leadership skills, and experience in delivering high-quality solutions while managing a team effectively.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Lead the design, development, and deployment of applications using .NET Core and related technologies.
  • Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and analyze requirements, ensuring alignment with project goals.
  • Provide technical leadership and mentorship to the development team.
  • Oversee project planning, scheduling, and execution to ensure timely delivery of milestones.
  • Review code to ensure adherence to coding standards and best practices.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues during the development lifecycle.
  • Coordinate with cross-functional teams, including QA, DevOps, and Product Management.
  • Monitor project risks and implement mitigation strategies.
  • Prepare and present progress reports to senior management and stakeholders.

Preferred Skills

  • Bachelor's/Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • 5+ years of experience in software development, with at least 3+ years in .NET Core.
  • Strong proficiency in C#, ASP.NET Core, Entity Framework, and RESTful APIs.
  • Hands-on experience with cloud platforms like Azure or AWS.
  • Familiarity with front-end technologies like Angular, React, or Vue.js is a plus.
  • Experience in microservices architecture and containerization (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).
  • Proven ability to manage a team and deliver projects on time.
summary: Seeking a Senior Dot Net Developer to lead .NET Core projects. Requires 5+ years of experience and proficiency in C# and RESTful APIs.

job_description:

job_description:
Odoo Server Admin

PromptTech Global (P) Ltd Module No 315, Nila Building, Technopark Campus, 695581 https://prompttechsolutions.com

Contact Email: hr@prompttechglobal.com

Closing Date: 06, Sept 2025 Job Published: 15, Aug 2025

Brief Description

We are seeking an experienced and proactive Odoo Server Administrator to manage and maintain our Odoo ERP infrastructure. The ideal candidate will be responsible for the deployment, configuration, performance tuning, monitoring, and troubleshooting of Odoo servers (both community and enterprise editions). You will also collaborate closely with the development and functional teams to ensure system availability, security, and scalability.

Responsibilities

  • Install, configure, and maintain Odoo servers (on-premise or cloud environments).
  • Manage Linux servers (primarily Ubuntu/Debian) that host Odoo environments.
  • Perform regular updates, upgrades, and patches to the Odoo system and its dependencies.
  • Monitor system performance, troubleshoot issues, and ensure high availability of services.
  • Configure and maintain PostgreSQL databases used by Odoo, including backups and restorations.
  • Implement and manage Odoo multi-instance architecture (if required).
  • Automate tasks using shell scripting and other tools to improve operational efficiency.
  • Set up and manage SSL certificates, reverse proxy (Nginx), and domain configurations.
  • Implement security best practices including firewall rules, fail2ban, and user access controls.
  • Collaborate with developers to support deployment pipelines (CI/CD) and Git-based workflows.
  • Maintain documentation related to server configurations, architecture, and SOPs.

Preferred Skills

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.
  • 2+ years of experience in system administration, with specific experience managing Odoo environments.
  • Strong hands-on experience with Linux (Ubuntu/Debian) server administration.
  • Solid understanding of Odoo architecture and PostgreSQL database management.
  • Experience with Nginx, Apache, and SSL/TLS configuration.
  • Familiarity with Docker, Kubernetes, or other container orchestration tools is a plus.
  • Good understanding of network security, firewalls, and access control.
  • Strong troubleshooting, problem-solving, and communication skills.

Nice to Have

  • Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
  • Knowledge of Python (used in Odoo) and ability to assist with minor development tasks.
  • Experience in setting up CI/CD pipelines for Odoo deployments.
summary: Seeking an Odoo Server Administrator to manage and maintain Odoo ERP infrastructure, ensuring system availability and security. Responsibilities include configuration, performance tuning, and troubleshooting Odoo servers.

  • Assess clients' insurance needs and recommend suitable plans
  • Follow up with clients to address any questions or concerns and ensure customer satisfaction
  • Meet or exceed sales targets and quotas

  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills
  • Ability to build rapport with clients and effectively convey information over the phone
  • Excellent negotiation and persuasion abilities

  • Proficiency in using CRM software and other sales tools

The ideal candidate will have a strong command of the English language, a passion for storytelling, and the ability to create compelling, clear, and engaging content across various platforms. This role involves working closely with the marketing and design teams to develop content strategies that align with business goals and brand voice.

  • Conduct in-depth research on industry-related topics and stay updated on trends.

  • Assist in developing content calendars and managing publishing schedules.
  • Monitor content performance and provide insights or improvements based on analytics.

  • 1–3 years of proven experience in content writing, copywriting, or related roles.
  • Exceptional writing, editing, and proofreading skills.
  • Strong research and storytelling ability.
  • Knowledge of SEO best practices and content optimization tools.
  • Familiarity with CMS platforms (e.g., WordPress).

job_description:
Senior Flutter Developer

Spericorn Technology Private Limited is seeking a highly skilled Senior Flutter Developer with 3+ years of hands-on experience to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in building cross-platform mobile applications for Android and iOS, deep knowledge of Flutter/Dart, and a proven track record of delivering high-quality, performant apps. You should be comfortable working on complex projects, integrating with APIs, handling state management, and optimizing app performance.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop, maintain, and enhance mobile applications using Flutter for Android and iOS platforms.
  • Write clean, scalable, and maintainable code following best practices and design patterns.
  • Collaborate with designers, backend developers, and product managers to deliver high-quality solutions.
  • Implement state management (Provider, Riverpod, Bloc, MobX, Redux, etc.) efficiently.
  • Integrate RESTful APIs and third-party services.
  • Ensure apps meet performance, quality, and responsiveness standards.
  • Write unit, integration, and widget tests to ensure code quality.
  • Manage app releases on Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
  • Troubleshoot and debug application issues.
  • Keep up to date with new Flutter/Dart features and industry trends.

Preferred Skills:

  • Flutter SDK (3+ years hands-on experience).
  • Dart programming language – strong understanding of syntax, asynchronous programming, and isolates.
  • State Management – Provider, Riverpod, Bloc, MobX, or Redux.
  • UI/UX Implementation – Custom widgets, responsive layouts, animations, and theme handling.
  • REST API Integration – JSON parsing, error handling, authentication flows (JWT, OAuth).
  • Version Control – Git/GitHub/GitLab/Bitbucket workflows.
  • Gradle configurations, CocoaPods, Play Store and App Store, handling build configurations, and CI/CD pipelines.
  • Firebase (Auth, Firestore, Push Notifications, Analytics).
  • Experience with payment gateways, maps, or real-time chat modules.
  • Experience in performance profiling and optimization.

Contact Information:

Spericorn Technology (P) Ltd Amstor Building, Technopark Phase I, Trivandrum , 695581 http://www.spericorn.com Contact Email: careers@spericorn.com

Closing Date: 31, Aug 2025 Job Published: 15, Aug 2025

Note: Kindly mention in the email subject "Application for the post of Senior Flutter Developer"
summary: Seeking a Senior Flutter Developer to build cross-platform mobile applications. The role involves using Flutter/Dart, integrating APIs, and optimizing app performance for Android and iOS.
